item.description:
Join other members for an early evening social at Kitty O'Sheas. We'll be downstairs enjoying happy hour. Look for our group! We'll be wearing name tags1

We'll be hanging out downstairs at Kitty O'Sheas from 8-10pm.

Cash bar will be available.

RSVP IS REQUIRED FOR FREE ADMISSION!
RSVP HERE - http://moxiebostonyou...



ADMISSION - PLEASE READ:
Admission is FREE with RSVP

AGE RANGE:
The age range of attendees will vary. The approximate age range of men and women based on past similar events is:
MEN - 25-45
WOMEN - 25-45

IMPORTANT!!!!!!
RSVP is REQUIRED for this event for both men and women. No exceptions. We have a lot of men showing up at the door without RSVPing. In order for us to work to ensure an even gender ratio, we need to have an accurate idea of men and women attending.

DRESS CODE
Absolutely NO RIPPED JEANS, NO SNEAKERS, NO ACTIVE WEAR.

THINGS TO KNOW:
*This event is open to all!
*Ethnically diverse crowd of professionals
*We'll be there from 8-10pm


CO-SPONSORED BY:
Boston Social Networking
The Boston Social/Professional Networking Meetup Group
item.name: Saturday Night Social - Free Event
